Article.Title:
More Enhancements to Pokemon Chart (Beta)
- AND -
Rayquaza Becomes Tier 5 RaidBoss!
Article.Text:
I have added more details in the Pokemon Chart (Beta) in the Charts section.
And it has been announced that Rayquaze will become a RaidBoss starting 9 Feb 2018, so I have moved it to the Tier 5 Raid Bosses.
Also:
It has been announced that more Gen 3 Pokemon will be released 9 Feb 2018, along with new Raid Bosses. As soon as I have the list, I will update the various pages.

Article.Title: New Pokemon Chart (Beta) In The Charts Section!
Article.Text:
Interested in seeing what Pokemon there are? How about ones that aren't released in Pokemon GO yet?
Check this out!

Article.Title: Aggron Is Now A Raid Boss!
Article.Text:
With the release of 23 more Pokemon from the Hoenn Region, another was added as a Raid Boss.
Check out what you can get!
